snippet: Sea salt proponents claim the trace minerals found in sea salts confer added health benefits; nutritionists say the amounts of added minerals are too small to offer a meaningful benefit. To learn more, watch the new Ask Well video.
abstract: Sea salt proponents claim the trace minerals found in sea salts confer added health benefits; nutritionists say the amounts of added minerals are too small to offer a meaningful benefit. To learn more, watch the new Ask Well video.

headline.main: Ask Well: Table Salt vs. Sea Salt
